thread.section_title: iPhoneIMEI.Net Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iPhoneIMEI.Net | iphoneimei.net
thread.title: Benny Balin

author: Benny Balin
title: Benny Balin
text: rating based on failed unlock experience 1 month ago. i contacted them before making the payment .they advised me to try and find my lost credentials and in case i fail i can always use their unlock service. this was their last human response. after that nothing. just auto response saying my legit phone reported as stolen and therefore cannot be unlocked and instead they giving me some voucher to other services that i have no interest in . so my money taken and no unlock. . no response so far. still not giving up
